summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1418, for the improvement of 4th Avenue South, from Seattle Boulevard at Lane Street to Andover Street produced, thence along Andover Street to 8th Avenue South, by constructing a plank roadway and wooden sidewalk, under Ordinance No. 15464 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
